sentences.english: The Chinese show was magnificent. Our athletes were brilliant.
sentences.chinese: 中國的閉幕式非常恢宏壯觀，我們的運動員們也優秀。

sentences.english: Nature plays a harmonious symphony of sounds together in such regions.
sentences.chinese: 在這些地區大自然都在演奏和諧恢宏的交響曲。

sentences.english: Shanghai's great tolerance originates from its history of sufficient opening-up.
sentences.chinese: 上海恢宏的氣度源於充分開放的歷史。

sentences.english: The architectural appearance of focus plaza is a high 70 meters′Grand double sub-tower.
sentences.chinese: 福地廣場爲70米高的雙子塔建築外形，恢宏大氣。

sentences.english: For in the nineteenth century he developed a grandiose conception of stratification.
sentences.chinese: 因爲在十九世紀，他對階層化提出恢宏的構想。

sentences.english: We gazed up at the cloudless blue sky, marvelling in the magnificence and beauty of it all.
sentences.chinese: 仰視藍天，萬里無雲，恢宏的美景讓我們慨嘆萬千。

sentences.english: We gazed up at the cloudless blue sky, marvelling in …
sentences.chinese: 望藍天，萬里無雲，恢宏的美景讓我們感慨萬千。

sentences.english: At that time we are so magnificent, cherish high aspirations.
sentences.chinese: 那時候的我們是多麼的氣勢恢宏，壯志凌雲。

sentences.english: The whole show at one go, the magnificent atmosphere, shocking the audience.
sentences.chinese: 整場演出一氣呵成，恢宏大氣，震撼全場。

sentences.english: Only the broad-minded, delicate features, can make more friends.
sentences.chinese: 只有心胸開闊，氣度恢宏的人，才能多交朋友。

sentences.english: The emperor he played was magnanimous.
sentences.chinese: 他扮演的古代皇帝氣度恢宏。

sentences.english: The orchestra has a performing team of nearly 100 people.
sentences.chinese: 中國廣播民族樂團擁有近百人的演奏編制，氣勢恢宏。

sentences.english: The fall flies straight down with a tremendous momentum.
